  implicit none
  integer, intent(inout) :: a(:)
  integer, intent(in) :: first, last
  integer :: pivot, i, j, temp

  if (first < last) then
    pivot = a((first + last)/2) i = first
    j = last
    do
      do while (a(i) < pivot) i = i + 1
      end do
      do while (a(j) > pivot)

      end do

      a(i) = a(j)
      a(j) = temp i = i + 1
      j = j - 1
    end do
    call quicksort(a, first, j)
    call quicksort(a, j+1, last)
  end if
end subroutine quicksort
